articles.content: COLUMBIA  Few appointments are available when South Carolinians ages 70 and older can start signing up Wednesday for the COVID-19 vaccine, so they should not expect to get a shot anytime soon, state … [+4222 chars]

articles.description: Reported plan would see Israel first reopen kindergartens, some school grades and stores, then use document to control access to hotels, culture and sports venues

articles.title: Here's where to register for a vaccine mega site regardless of which North Texas county you live in - WFAA.com
articles.description: The mass vaccine hubs are being set up in North Texas and you don’t have to be a resident in those counties to sign up for the vaccine.
articles.content:
Texas is switching up its vaccine rollout to reach more people: officials are now focusing on mass vaccination hubs instead of sending doses to many providers across the state.
